headline: FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) Stock Dips 4% As 2024 Earnings Show Sales Rise But Net Income Falls
summary: FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) recently reported its earnings for FY 2024, showing an increase in sales and revenue but a decline in net income and earnings per share. Despite providing guidance for core earnings per share to grow in 2025 and maintaining its dividend outlook, the company's stock fell by 3.67% over the last month. This decline occurs alongside broader market fluctuations, including a 1.9% dip in the market over the same period, influenced by concerns surrounding new U.S. tariffs and...
